definition: to apply (paint etc)/to smear/to daub/to blot out/to scribble/to scrawl/(literary) mud/street

sentences.english: Performance of coating plate with the special hydrophobic coating solution was better.
sentences.chinese: 採用雙疏塗層溶液塗覆的多孔板相對好一些。

sentences.english: A silver mirror, coated with a gold-coloured protective layer.
sentences.chinese: 銀色鏡面塗層加上金色保護層。

sentences.english: Both drug-eluting stents were associated with a marked reduction in target-lesion revascularization.
sentences.chinese: 兩種藥物塗層組靶血管病變的發生率均顯著下降。

sentences.english: He fished a coin out of a drawer and began scratching off the latex coating.
sentences.chinese: 他從抽屜裏拿出一個硬幣，開始刮開橡膠塗層。

sentences.english: Our unique Bio-lipid coating insures bio-availability.
sentences.chinese: 我們獨特的生物脂塗層確保了生物有效性。

sentences.english: Cylinder sleeves, camshafts and piston pins can be coated with the new method.
sentences.chinese: 新塗層工藝適用於汽缸套，凸輪軸和活塞銷。

sentences.english: Wash the instant noodles with warm water first, stir it and pour away the water containing the wax coating。
sentences.chinese: 用溫水沖洗方便麪，攪拌，然後倒掉含有蠟塗層的水。

sentences.english: The erosion resistance of HVOF-sprayed is enhanced with the temperature increasing.
sentences.chinese: 溫度升高，塗層的抗沖蝕性能提高。

sentences.english: The hydroxyapatite-coated prosthesis helped to reduce stress difference at bone and prosthesis interface.
sentences.chinese: 羥磷灰石表面塗層假體能緩和界面層的應力差異。

sentences.english: PU-coated leather provides durability and easy care.
sentences.chinese: 聚氨酯塗層皮革提供耐用性。

sentences.english: Surface morphologies of coatings prepared by SPPS presented obvious layer structure.
sentences.chinese: SPPS法制備的塗層表面形貌呈現明顯的層狀結構。

sentences.english: We can also Coated with emulsion for customer and make hole according to customer requirement.
sentences.chinese: 可以代客預上感光塗層，按照使用尺寸打定位孔。

sentences.english: Hexavalent chromium (Cr-VI) in chromate conversion coatings as surface treatment.
sentences.chinese: 表面處理用鉻酸鹽轉化塗層中的六價鉻。

sentences.english: Technology of obtaining Zinc-based sintered coating with globular Zinc powder was studied.
sentences.chinese: 探索了球狀鋅粉鋅基燒結塗層的基本工藝條件。

sentences.english: Operator housing is powder coated for improved cleanliness.
sentences.chinese: 操作機構外殼採用粉末塗層以改善清潔度。

definition: acrylic (loanword)/see also 壓克力|压克力[ya1 ke4 li4]
